title: Dungeon Full Dive
description: Originally funded with a Kickstarter Campaign, Dungeon Full Dive is a new, immersive way to play Tabletop RPGs (TTRPGs) like Dungeons & Dragons for VR and PC. I lead the team against the initial technical challenges of building a sandbox multiplayer game compatible with both platforms, namely Peer 2 Peer Multiplayer, Performance Optimization & Input complexity. Later, my focus shifted to the ruleset implementation of D&D and associated gameplay mechanics while managing a team of up to 5 Developers and 3 QA.

title: Smalltown Tavern (VR)
description: A Game created during a Game Jam where you and your friends are tasked with managing a bar and all its angry customers in VR. Next to programming, I helped with the Art Direction and worked on Shaders & VFX.

title: Modding
description: I spent the last year modding a bunch of games that I was interested in. One for fun :), and two for learning more about different programming techniques and architectures used in games. Some of them include Against the Storm, Minecraft, Desperados & Rimworld.

title: Order Automation Web App
description: An interface for automating orders of hearing aids that connects internal Web Apps & User interfaces to the ERP systems of various manufacturers. In addition to the programming, I communicated with customers to manage and understand their expectation.
